response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This exceptional item carries a unique value that exceeds expectations, making it an unparalleled investment for those seeking unparalleled quality and functionality. Considering its exceptional features and benefits, I am offering this remarkable product to you at a special introductory price of $750,000. I believe this offer presents a fantastic opportunity for you to experience the unmatched value this product has to offer. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further details or proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 750000}
